svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-12"> <mxGeometry x="0.0657" y="3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-1" value="User wants to execute "/usr/bin/id" as root" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacingLeft=5;spacingRight=5;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="410" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-11" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-6" target="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-16" value="<div>Systemd executes /usr/bin/sud --daemon&nbsp;</div><div>and passes FD of the connection</div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-11"> <mxGeometry x="-0.1395" y="2" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="7" y="10" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-6" value="Systemd" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="364" y="90" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-9" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-7" target="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-14" value="<div>SUD Client opens a connection at&nbsp;</div><div>@sud_privilege_manager_socket and</div><div>systemd accepts it<br></div>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-9"> <mxGeometry x="0.0842" y="-1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-8" y="4" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-17" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" edge="1" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="29" y="1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KMv7rEkzuSz5SDHK5zmh-7" value="SUD Client" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacingTop=5;spacingLeft=5;spacingBottom=5;spacingRight=5;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="240" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 262px; margin-left: 103px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;
